title: Microsoft Windows 3.11 Collection
description:
This is a collection of Microsoft Windows for Workgroups 3.11 and contemporary Microsoft software in a single DVD. Check out my other torrents for similar software compilations.

To easy/quick clean MS-DOS 6.22 and Windows for Workgroups 3.11 install:
- Select option 2 "Run FDISK.", and create a disk partition.
- Select option 3 "Format C: and quick install MS-DOS 6.22 + Windows for Workgroups 3.11." and follow the instructions.

List of included software:
